SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.physics.solid

Class Cuboid

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.physics.solid.Cuboid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Solid
public class Cuboid extends Object implements Solid

Cuboid

Represents a solid cuboid in three-dimensional space.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cuboid

      public Cuboid(@Nonnull Vector3 centroid, @Nonnull Quaternion rotation, @Nonnull Vector3 dimensions, double mass)
      Creates a cuboid with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      centroid - The centroid of the cuboid.
      rotation - The rotation of the cuboid.
      dimensions - The dimensions (width, height, depth) of the cuboid.
      mass - The mass of the cuboid.

    • Cuboid

      protected Cuboid(@Nonnull Vector3 centroid, @Nonnull Quaternion rotation, @Nonnull Vector3 dimensions, double mass, @Nonnull Vector3 a, @Nonnull Vector3 b, @Nonnull Vector3 c, @Nonnull Vector3 d, @Nonnull Vector3 e, @Nonnull Vector3 f, @Nonnull Vector3 g, @Nonnull Vector3 h)
      Constructs a Cuboid with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      centroid - The centroid of the cuboid.
      rotation - The rotation of the cuboid as a Quaternion.
      dimensions - The dimensions of the cuboid as a Vector3.
      mass - The mass of the cuboid.
      a - Vertex A of the cuboid.
      b - Vertex B of the cuboid.
      c - Vertex C of the cuboid.
      d - Vertex D of the cuboid.
      e - Vertex E of the cuboid.
      f - Vertex F of the cuboid.
      g - Vertex G of the cuboid.
      h - Vertex H of the cuboid.
